marklogic.body:
Spot on.
Only thing is the apparition of Christian to Jack in the hospital after he left the island. I questioned it as well but remember that the MiB could not leave the island. He could've turned that donkey wheel like a roulette wheel and he would never have travelled anywhere coz the rules didn't allow it.
It's long been thought that Jack saw nothing but a drug-hazed hallucination. He was at the peak of his prescription drug addiction (as evidenced by his asking of the other dr that turns up for a new prescription). The writers were very clever about playing with our minds in that scene too... Did you notice a smoke alarm goes Off just before we see the Christian-apparition. Creepy! ;)
